function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of internet-based survey data with potential for biased responses due to self-selection","Impact":"Inaccurate data leading to flawed conclusions and recommendations","Mitigation":"Use random sampling techniques and validate data from multiple sources","Technologies":"Random sampling algorithms, data validation software","People":"Researchers, survey respondents","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Survey focused on New York metropolitan area, limiting generalizability to other regions","Impact":"Limited applicability of findings to other areas heavily affected by COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conduct additional surveys in other heavily affected areas, compare and contrast findings","Technologies":"Survey distribution platforms, comparative analysis tools","People":"Research team, survey respondents from other areas","Owner":"Research team, stakeholders interested in broader applicability"},{"Description":"Reliance on self-reported data for perceived risk of COVID-19 infection and energy usage","Impact":"Potential for inaccurate or exaggerated responses leading to unreliable conclusions","Mitigation":"Corroborate self-reported data with objective measures, validate responses through follow-up studies","Technologies":"Objective measurement tools, follow-up survey software","People":"Research team, survey respondents","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"}]}
